title: ICE: Unnamed argument in static trait methods

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
Script to reproduce:

``` rust
trait Foo {
    // Good
    fn foo(&self);

    // Good
    fn bar(u8);

    // Good
    fn baz(&self) {

    }

    // ICE
    fn quux(u8) {

    }
}

fn main() {

}
```

Backtrace:

``` bash

note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
```
